function RYU_EP04_08()
    -- .起-6【11月第2週】「ウランとエリカの初デート」
    SaveData.Title = "ウランとエリカの初デート"

    -- //BG：駅前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav")

    -- //BU：ウラン・通常
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")

    MSG([[ Thirty minutes before the date meeting time. I had left with plenty of time to make sure I would never be late for the meeting. ]])

    MSG([[ But considering Uran's personality, she might come early, so I need to act early as well to avoid making her anxious. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1764.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Even so, thirty minutes early might be a bit too much." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Maybe I'm just too nervous. ]])

    MSG([[ As I walked to the station square while pondering this—I witnessed a shocking sight. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1765.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "U-Uran!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0571.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh? Erika-san, what an early arrival<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    MSG([[ Uran was already there. ]])

    -- //CI：ゴザを敷いてのんびりするゆるウラン 142
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI142a")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ She had laid out a mat in front of the station and was drinking tea. ]])

    MSG([[ Naturally, with Uran's exceptional appearance, passersby were casting strange looks her way. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1766.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, this is bad! Please pack up that mat immediately and let's move!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0572.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Is it problematic to have a mat in front of the station? I didn’t know that." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    -- //SE：手を鳴らす音 ×２
    PLAY_SE("SEa018.wav")
    WAIT(400)
    PLAY_SE("SEa018.wav")
    WAIT(600)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0573.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Everyone attending me, please put away the mat." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran-knight_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Attendants】
 "Understood!" ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ When Uran stood up and clapped her hands twice, women dressed in traditional clothing appeared from somewhere, hurriedly packed the mat, and prepared Uran’s footwear. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0574.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Shall we be going then?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1767.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-yes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I took Uran’s hand, and we started walking. I was reminded from the start that Uran and I come from completely different worlds. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：都会
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG008aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Regaining my composure, we headed to the usual O’su district. ]])

    MSG([[ We chose this area because the station’s busy shopping district could lead to rumors if other students saw us, and this town lets us look around many stores. ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン・私服・笑顔
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0575.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Wow. This town is lively, isn’t it?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1768.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Is this your first time in O’su?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0576.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I have visited the large nearby temple several times with my family, but this town itself is new to me." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0577.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Ah, Erika-san! There’s even a Western maid walking around! Is this a town where Western noble families come too?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1769.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah, that’s just a maid café flyer. It’s probably the town with the most maid cafés in the Tokai region." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0578.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "How wonderful... Could we take a picture with them later?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1770.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Usually that’s a bit difficult, but those maids will surely allow it. I was once taught maid etiquette by them." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0579.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san, you’ve... been a Western maid…!?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02oa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0580.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Well then. It must have suited you very well." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran gazed at me with an incredibly ecstatic expression. ]])

    MSG([[ T-this topic might be dangerous to continue. I need to get us into a shop quickly! ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1771.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-yeah. It’s still a bit early, but how about a quick lunch first?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1772.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Most places should be relatively empty this time of day. If there’s a dish you want to try, we can go there." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0581.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Lunch? Uhm..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0582.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Actually, there’s a Western dish I’ve wanted to try." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1773.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That’s great. I’m sure we can find a delicious place in O’su. Let’s look together." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0583.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I’m happy. Please do look with me. Panzer vor!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1774.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Tanks forward!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //CG：ウランとデート（目を輝かせるウラン）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV033aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0584.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Kyaaaaa! How adorable!" ]])

    MSG([[ The moment the dish we came for was placed before her, Uran’s eyes sparkled like a child’s with joy. ]])

    MSG([[ What Uran wanted to eat was not a Panzer but pancakes. ]])

    MSG([[ Apparently, her classmates often showed her photos, and she had become curious. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1775.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, shall I take a picture with you?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0585.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I-is that okay? Please do!" ]])

    MSG([[ I took her smartphone and took a picture with the pancakes. ]])

    MSG([[ When we met at the station, I thought we lived in different worlds, but seeing her now, I realized she’s just a girl our age... and smiled. ]])

    MSG([[ Well, I’m a boy student, though. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0586.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "By the way, Erika-san, don’t they serve chopsticks at this place?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1776.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Chopsticks!? W-well, for pancakes, I think it’s fine to just cut and eat with a fork and knife." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0587.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Fo-‘fork’ and ‘knife’… This is the greatest trial in Uran Ryuguuin’s life." ]])

    MSG([[ That’s such an everyday trial. ]])

    MSG([[ But for Uran, this was a serious matter; she trembled as she held the fork and knife, freezing with both tips pointed straight down. ]])

    -- //CG：ウランとデート（フォークとナイフが下手過ぎるウラン）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV033ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ This is bad. The sight is somewhat dangerous. It looks exactly like a fisherman trying to spear a fish underwater. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1777.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "A-are you okay...?! That way of holding them is dangerous!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0588.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Rest assured. I also studied swordsmanship at home." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1778.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "This isn’t the time for swordsmanship! L-let me show you how to hold a fork and knife! Watch!" ]])

    MSG([[ I desperately lectured her on how to hold the knife and fork. ]])

    MSG([[ Uran listened sincerely but just couldn’t get it right. ]])

    MSG([[ It really was no joke that Western knowledge didn’t get through to her head, I realized. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0589.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Western culture truly is profound." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1779.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-yeah." ]])

    MSG([[ "I swallowed the words ‘This is just a shallow part’ and smiled. ]])

    -- //CG：ウランとデート（ドヤ顔ウラン・岸田メル持ち）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV033ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0590.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "How about this, Erika-san? Doesn’t it look elegant?" ]])

    MSG([[ Ultimately, the tips had been reversed up and down, making it even more dangerous. ]])

    MSG([[ But she also had a very cute smug face, and she was dexterous with this grip, so I decided not to say anything more. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1780.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "It’s delicious, Uran-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0591.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes, really. I like the simple, clean taste of Japanese sweets, but I also love the flavors of Western desserts." ]])

    -- //CG：ウランとデート（微笑ウラン・岸田メル持ち）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV033ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0592.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I must not just admire from afar, but properly engage and understand. I need to learn how to hold things besides chopsticks." ]])

    MSG([[ Seems she was aware her grip was still wrong, and she smiled at me. ]])

    MSG([[ I feel sorry for having to give up halfway. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1781.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If you don’t mind, I’ll help as much as you want. Just tell me anything." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0593.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Thank you, Erika-san. Thanks to you, I’ve started to change little by little." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0594.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I no longer reject change entirely as before. I protect what should not be changed and accept changes for the better." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0595.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I believe this is the happiest path for Yuriai Private Academy and for us." ]])

    MSG([[ The roughly two-month conflict with Uran and the conservatives. ]])

    MSG([[ Thinking back, it was really tough, but if Uran can smile like this now, it wasn’t for nothing. ]])

    MSG([[ Remembering Hermes’s words, “The key is to make even those who opposed it smile in the end,” I smiled back. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1782.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, let’s enjoy today without thinking too much about the academy. I’ll go anywhere you want to go." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0596.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "A-anywhere I want to go...? Hmm, I’d like to visit places where I can see lots of clothes." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0597.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "As you can see, my casual clothes are like this." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1783.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "In that case, there are many shops down this street. Let’s find some clothes you like." ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：都会
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG008aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ After lunch, we really did visit many stores. ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン・私服・驚き
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0598.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san, look! That off-shoulder dress displayed at that shop has no straps on the shoulders or any strings. How do you wear it?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1784.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah, that type of off-shoulder dress adjusts to your body shape with straps at the shoulders." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1785.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If you’re curious, want to try it on? I’ll ask the clerk." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0599.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Really? Y-yes, please!" ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG008aa")
    -- //BU：ウラン・私服・笑顔
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1786.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "There seems to be no size that fits you, Uran-san... Specifically, your bust size..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0600.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "P-please don’t worry about that. I’m used to it." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",1000,false)

    -- //BG：都会
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG008aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン・私服・悲しみ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0601.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san... Thank you for advancing the payment earlier." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0602.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I didn’t expect some shops wouldn’t accept this black card. There are still many things in this world I do not know." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1787.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Don’t worry. Many small shops don’t accept credit cards." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0603.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Brigid?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1788.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Credit." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The black card that only high-income families can have. I’m sure she uses it without knowing its rarity... I smiled wryly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0604.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Thanks to you today, Erika-san, I’ve learned many things. Truly, thank you." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1789.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "On the contrary, it was fun seeing so many sides of you that I didn’t know. It feels like it’s been a long time since I laughed this much." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It’s been a month and a half since Daria-san stopped appearing at the academy. ]])

    MSG([[ Since then, my days had been filled with overly negative thoughts, so today was a great break. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0605.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "…………" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1790.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Is something wrong?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0606.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Ah, sorry. Today was really fun, but thinking about Marika-sama still suffering is painful." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0607.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san, whatever time you spent with me today, I will repay by being of help to you." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1791.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Haha..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0608.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "W-what’s wrong?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1792.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah, sorry. Watching you feels like I’m looking at myself." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I began to understand Akira’s feeling when she said “Just enjoy a date with the girl you like.” ]])

    MSG([[ Like Uran, I often worry about Marika-neesan and end up neglecting myself. ]])

    MSG([[ I might be wearing that same anxious, strained expression as Uran now. ]])

    MSG([[ No wonder those close to me worry. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1793.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, let’s go out together more often from now on. To investigate Marika together in the future, I think we should get to know each other better." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0609.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "If Erika-san says so... I’m happy too." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran responded nervously to my words. ]])

    MSG([[ Her cheeks flushed red enough to rival the setting sun’s glow. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0610.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I want to know you more and spend lots of time together." ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0490.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "I’m moved by your loving closeness, Erika-kun and Uran-kun." ]])
    -- //ダリア

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1794.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That voice—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Turning around, I saw a figure walking toward us from the sunset. ]])

    MSG([[ The clear features revealed a person I know well— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1795.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Why are you here, Daria Himegami?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_09")
end
